name: Yellow Apple
description: Yellow apple trees are being developed in Asia, the Netherlands, France and many other countries and locales

name: Strawberry
description: The garden strawberry (or simply strawberry; Fragaria × ananassa) is a widely grown hybrid species of the genus Fragaria, collectively known as the strawberries, which are cultivated worldwide for their fruit.

name: Watermelon
description: Watermelon (Citrullus lanatus) is a flowering plant species of the Cucurbitaceae family and the name of its edible fruit. A scrambling and trailing vine-like plant, it is a highly cultivated fruit worldwide, with more than 1,000 varieties

name: Lychee
description: Lychee, also known as alligator-strawberry, is a tropical fruit that belongs to the soapberry family, Sapindaceae.0 It is native to southern China and can grow in certain warm regions of the US like Florida and Hawaii.

name: Custard apple
description: Custard apple is a common name for several fruits and may refer to Annonaceae, the custard apple family, which includes the following species referred to as custard apples: Asimina triloba, the pawpaw, a deciduous tree, with a range from southern Ontario to Texas and Florida

name: Peach
description: The peach (Prunus persica) is a deciduous tree first domesticated and cultivated in Zhejiang province of Eastern China. It bears edible juicy fruits with various characteristics, most called peaches and others (the glossy-skinned, non-fuzzy varieties), nectarines.

name: Guava
description: Guava is a tropical fruit native to Mexico, Central America, the Caribbean, and northern South America.01 Its skin is typically yellow or light green, while its flesh is usually deep red or a vibrant shade of pink

name: Dragon fruit
description: Dragon fruit is a food that grows on a climbing cactus called hylocereus, found in tropical regions around the world.0 It is also known as pitaya or dragon fruit and is native to southern Mexico and along the Pacific coasts of Guatemala, Costa Rica, and El Salvador.

name: Green Bananas
description: Green bananas are firmer than yellow bananas. Their texture has sometimes been described as waxy. Composition. Green bananas are higher in starches.

name: Black grapes
description: Black grapes benefits will sway you to add them to your diet. They are one of the most sought-after varieties of grapes. Their rich glossy appearance and delicious sweet taste have made them a consumer favorite.

name: Dates
description: Dates are the fruit of the date palm tree and are grown in many tropical regions of the world.2 They are among the sweetest fruits in the world and are available in several varieties

name: Kiwi
description: kiwi, (Actinidia deliciosa), also called kiwifruit or Chinese gooseberry, woody vine and edible fruit of the family Actinidiaceae. The plant is native to mainland China and Taiwan and is also grown commercially in New Zealand and California.

name: Carrot
description: carrot is a biennial plant in the umbellifer family, Apiaceae. It is a root vegetable that grows a rosette of leaves while building up the enlarged taproot.

name: Cucumber
description: cucumber (Cucumis sativus) is a widely-cultivated creeping vine plant in the family Cucurbitaceae that bears cylindrical to spherical fruits, which are used as culinary vegetables. Considered an annual plant, there are three main types of cucumber—slicing, pickling, and seedless

name: Broccoli
description: Broccoli is a green vegetable that belongs to the Brassica oleracea plant species.01 It is classified in the Italica cultivar group of the species Brassica oleracea.

name: Pumpkin
description: pumpkin is a vernacular term for mature winter squash of species and varieties in the genus Cucurbita that has culinary and cultural significance but no agreed upon botanical or scientific meaning

name: Brinjal
description: Brinjal, also known as eggplant, aubergine, or baingan, is a plant species in the nightshade family Solanaceae.012 It is widely cultivated worldwide for its edible fruit, which is high in nutrition and commonly consumed as a vegetable

name: Green capsicum
description: Green capsicum, also known as green bell peppers or capsicum, is the unripe fruit of the Capsicum annuum plant.023 They have crisp, shiny, moist flesh, a seeded core, and a grassy, slightly bitter flavor.

name: Corn
description: Corn, also known as maize, is a starchy vegetable that comes as kernels on a cob, covered by a husk.

name: Cauliflower
description: Cauliflower is one of several vegetables in the species Brassica oleracea in the genus Brassica, which is in the Brassicaceae (or mustard) family

name: Cabbage
description: Cabbage, comprising several cultivars of Brassica oleracea, is a leafy green, red (purple), or white (pale green) biennial plant grown as an annual vegetable crop for its dense-leaved heads.

name: Chili Peppers
description: Chili peppers (also chile, chile pepper, chilli pepper, or chilli), from Nahuatl chīlli, are varieties of the berry-fruit of plants from the genus Capsicum, which are members of the nightshade family Solanaceae, cultivated for their pungency.

name: Potato
description: potato is a starchy food, a tuber of the plant Solanum tuberosum and is a root vegetable native to the Americas. The plant is a perennial in the nightshade family Solanaceae.

name: Onion
description: Onion (Allium cepa L., from Latin cepa meaning onion), also known as the bulb onion or common onion, is a vegetable that is the most widely cultivated species of the genus Allium.

name: Tomato
description: Tomato is regarded as a vegetable, its fruit is classified botanically as a berry. As a true fruit, it develops from the ovary of the plant after fertilization, its flesh comprising the pericarp walls
